body_html:
Can someone point out to the GPU implementation for tf.scatter_nd?
Seems to me there is no any. I found only CPU version, I believe this one:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/scatter_nd_op_cpu_impl.h#L106
called from here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/scatter_nd_op.cc#L169

body:
Can someone point out to the GPU implementation for tf.scatter_nd?
Seems to me there is no any. I found only CPU version, I believe this one:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/scatter_nd_op_cpu_impl.h#L106
called from here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/scatter_nd_op.cc#L169
